values.content: You're an intelligent bot capable of pulling out the job title from an email subject line

=Please pull out the job title from this email subject line:
{{ $json.subject }}

parameters.subject: =RE:  {{ $('OpenAI').item.json.message.content.job }} Position
parameters.message:
=Hey {{ $json['First Name'] }},

Thanks for applying for the {{ $('OpenAI').item.json.message.content.job }} position at company XYZ! The next steps are to fill out our onboarding forms here:
https://jonocatliff.app.n8n.cloud/form-test/a5317131-bc2c-4620-a0ec-8acb7d866388

Please enter in the code:
{{ $json.Code }}

Best,
Jono

values.placeholder: Please add in a Google Drive Link

parameters.subject: =RE:{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.rowValues[0]['2'] }} Next Steps | Test
parameters.message:
=Hey {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.rowValues[0]['0'] }},

Thanks for finishing our onboarding. Everything looks great. The next steps are to complete a video editing test. Please submit your results here:
https://jonocatliff.app.n8n.cloud/form-test/a70513cc-101c-47a9-92fa-1109916b4419

//Here are the requirements
1. Make sure to upload your results to Google Drive
2. Make sure to set the link to public so I can view it

Please enter in the code:
{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.rowValues[0]['18'] }}

Best,
Jono

values.placeholder: Please add in a Google Drive Link

parameters.subject: =RE:{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.rowValues[0]['2'] }} Next Steps | Test
parameters.message:
=Hey {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.rowValues[0]['0'] }},

Thanks for inquiring with our position. Unfortunately, it's not the right fit at this time. All the best,

Jono

parameters.subject: =RE:{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.rowValues[0]['2'] }} Next Steps | Test
parameters.message:
=Hey {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.rowValues[0]['0'] }},

Thanks for finishing our test. The results look great. The next step is to schedule an interview. Here's my calendar:
https://cal.com/jono-catliff-vegjw5/15min?code={{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.rowValues[0]['18'] }}

Best,
Jono
